Title: Prohibits the use, with exceptions, of an electronic entry card or device as a mechanism for resident or resident's guest to enter or exit a residential building
Summary: Prohibits the use, with exceptions, of an electronic entry card or device as a mechanism for a resident or a resident's guest to enter or exit a residential building unless such resident affirmatively consents in writing to use of such card or device.
LawCode: Add ยง18-e, Gen City L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to electronic entry cards which register personal identifying information
